title: Stain
description: A rock sensation.A Hollywood starlet.A reclusive journalist.Murder.Accused of murdering his fiancï¿½, Blake Collins drops from the radar. His chosen sanctuary? The girl he left behind.Katarina Soloway is the one person Blake trusts to uncover the facts, but the further they dig, the more twisted the truth becomes.When paths cross, no one is safe. Horrors always leave a mark. The stain of truth may never come clean.
author: M.  Hayes
